vocabulary.definition: a new and different appearance (apariencia renovada)
the final stage of secondary education (escuela secundaria, bachillerato)
a neighborhood, often in a Spanish-speaking community (barrio)
the style in which someone’s hair is cut (corte de cabello)
brave and confident in a noticeable way (atrevido, audaz)
a place where men get their hair cut (barbería)
a tool used to cut hair (maquinilla de cortar cabello)
a tool used to shave or trim hair (navaja, rasuradora)
to pause before doing or saying something (dudar, vacilar)
a confident or knowing smile (sonrisa burlona)
a hairstyle that gradually changes from short to long (degradado)
the image seen in a mirror or shiny surface (reflejo)
a style of Latin music with hip-hop and reggae influences (reguetón)
a person you do not know (desconocido)
a person who oversees music recordings (productor musical)
working as a model for photos or videos (modelaje)
a short film that accompanies a song (video musical)
